attributes.action: Why has UK Events & Exhibition sector been abandoned by the Government
attributes.additional_details: Government has supported many industry sectors that have returned to work - Eat Out To Help Out, reduced VAT etc but there is no support for an industry sector that has been unable to return to work. Government turned to the Events Sector for Nightingale Hospitals, Mortuaries & Test Centre’s at the start of the Pandemic yet ever since then the Events & Exhibition Sectors have been completely overlooked with regards to helping our sector return to what we do best
attributes.background: Hold a debate with regards to why the Events & Exhibitions Sector has been overlooked for further funding given that our sector has been closed since the lockdown. Our sector generates in excess of £80 Billion in UK Revenues and employs nearly 1M people

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Let Us Dance - Support nightclubs, dance music events and festivals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332789

Give further financial support to the Events and Hospitality industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329985
